content: NPR PR MP Pipe press ring Press rings for thick-walled profile press fittings up to 4. Compatible with Hilti NPR 32-A pipe press tools. ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Inserts for pressing, crimping & cutting- ### FEATURES:Features Press rings designed for for MegaPress® profile press fittings made by Viega® for up to 4 Press rings designed for for PowerPress® profile press fittings made by VSH® for up to 2 Press rings designed for for PowerPress® profile press fittings made by Apollo® for up to 2 Equipped with NFC tag for easier identification and management via the Hilti Connect app and ON!Track tool tracking software Applications Pressing thick-walled carbon steel pipes from 1 1/4 to 4* Pressing thick-walled stainless steel pipes from 1 1/4 to 4* Press rings must be used with the respective press adapter. For more information, please see the instructions for use. *These values are system dependent. In order to ensure correct and safe pressing consult the original instructions manual from the system supplier. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Press profile: MP (Megapress, Powerpress) Technical Data | Press profile | MP (Megapress, Powerpress) ### ITEMS- 3700870 - NPR MP Ring combo (2 1/2, 3, 4 inch, Act - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x NPR PA 3 pipe pressing Actuator jaws - 1x NPR PR MP L Tool case assy - 1x NPR PR MP 2 1/2 Press ring - 1x NPR PR MP 3 Press ring - 1x NPR PR MP 4 Press ring - 3700869 - NPR MP Ring combo (1 1/4, 1 1/2, 2 inch, - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x NPR PA 2 pipe pressring Actuator jaws - 1x NPR PR MP S Tool case assy - 1x NPR PR MP 1 1/4 Press ring - 1x NPR PR MP 1 1/2 Press ring - 1x NPR PR MP 2 Press ring - 2295065 - Press ring NPR PR MP 4 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x NPR PR MP 4 Press ring - 2295064 - Press ring NPR PR MP 3 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x NPR PR MP 3 Press ring - 2295063 - Press ring NPR PR MP 2 1/2 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x NPR PR MP 2 1/2 Press ring - 2295062 - Press ring NPR PR MP 2 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x NPR PR MP 2 Press ring - 2295061 - Press ring NPR PR MP 1 1/2 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x NPR PR MP 1 1/2 Press ring - 2295060 - Press ring NPR PR MP 1 1/4 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x NPR PR MP 1 1/4 Press ring
